enum: Right to be forgotten - Deletion of your data (art. 17 - GDPR)
Right to data portability - Request your data (art. 20 - GDPR)
Right to rectification - Rectification of your data (art. 16 - GDPR)
Right of access - Request for verification of whether data processing is taking place (art. 15 - GDPR)
